channel.title: No Code on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in No Code on LC-Research

item.title: My First Glide App
item.description: I need to develop a personal mobile app that works on android. But, I don’t have much time on hand or coding skills required. I hear there are platforms that can turn spreadsheets into mobile apps. Is it even possible? How long would it take to build one from scratch?
